Translations.Text: Taiken o shoaku nasa reru kata ni shukufuku are. Hontoni kare wa subete no koto ni zen'no de ara reru
(Kare wa) shi to nama o tsukura reta katadearu. Sore wa, anata gata no naka dare no okonai ga sugurete iru no ka o kokoromi rareru tame de, kare wa iryoku narabinaku kan'yode ara reru

(Kare wa) isso isso ni, 7 ten o tsukura reru okata. Jihi amaneku okata no sozo ni wa, sukoshi no fuchowa mo nai koto o mirudearou. Sorede aratamete kansatsu shi nasai. Anata wa nani ka sakeme o miru no ka
Sore de imaichido,-me o agete miruga i. Anata no shisen wa,(nani no kekkan mo sagashidasezu) tada bon'yari shite moto ni modoru dakedearu
Kare wa tomyo (hoshi) o motte, sai kaso no ten o kazari, akuma-tachi ni taisuru haritsuke (ryusei) to nashi, mata kare-ra no tame ni rekka no chobatsu o junbi shita
Kare-ra no omo o shinjinai mono ni wa, jigoku no chobatsu ga aru. Nanto warui kaeri-shodearu koto yo
Kare-ra ga sono naka ni nagekoma reru toki, sore (jigoku) ga futto suru ka no yo ni bukimide ki shi ion de unaru no o kare-ra wa kikou
Hageshi ikari no tame ni haretsu suru ka no yodearu. Ichidan ga sono naka ni nagekoma reru tabi ni, soko no kanshu wa kare-ra ni,`anata gata ni, keikoku-sha wa yattekonakatta no ka.' To tou

Kare-ra wa iu. `Sodesu, tashikani hitori no keikoku-sha ga watashi-tachi no moto ni yattekimashita. Daga watashi-tachi wa kyohi shite itta. “Arra wa nani (no keiji) mo kudasa renai. Anata gata wa, taihen'na kago no naka ni iru dakedearu.”
Kare-ra wa nao iu. `Watashi-tachi ga kiki, jukuko shitanaraba, rekka no junin no nakaniha hairanakattadeshou ni
Kare-ra wa jibun no samazamana tsumi o mitometa. Rekka no junin wa,(yosha kara) tokuhanarete iru
Hontoni menimienai-nushi o, osoreru mono ni wa, yosha to idaina hosho ga arou
Anata gataga kotoba o kakushite ite mo, mata sore o arawashite mo, kare wa hontoni mune no naka no mono o shitte ora reru
Kare ga sozo sa reta mono o, shiranaidearou ka. Kare wa, shin'o o rikai shi tsugyo nasa reru
Kare koso wa, daichi o anata gata ni tsukai yasuku nasa reta katadearu. Sorede sono sho chiiki o orai shi, kare no kate o taberuga yoi. Soshite fukkatsu no toki ni hakare ni mesa rete iku midearu
Daichi ga yureugoku toki, ten ni imasu kata ga, anata gata o sore ni nomikoma se rarenaidearou to, anshin shite iru no ka
Mata anata gata wa ten ni imasu kata ga,(saseki no) reppu o anata gata ni okura renaidearou to, anshin shite iru no ka. Yagate anata gata wa, waga keikoku ga ikaganaru mono ka o shirudearou
Hontoni anata gata izen no mono-tachi mo,(waga keikoku o) usodearu to shita. Sorede waga fukyo ga ikaga ni (osoroshi monode) atta ka

Kare-ra wa ue o tobutori ni tsuite kangaenai no ka. Tsubasa o hiroge, mata sore o tatamude wanai ka. Jihi amaneku okata no soto, dare ga sorera o sasaeru koto ga dekiyou. Hontoni kare wa, subete no koto o gozonji de ara reru
Jihi amaneku okata o sashioite anata gata o tasukeru gunzei to nari eru mono wa, daredearu no ka. Fushin-sha wa, moso shite iru nisuginai
Kare ga moshi o megumi o tome rareru to, anata gata ni megumi o nashi eru mono wa daredearu no ka. Iya kare-ra wa koman to,(shinri kara no) kaihi ni koshusuru
Kao o fusete (tada katakuna ni) aruku mono to, tadashi michi no ue o kisokutadashiku aruku mono to, dochira ga yoku michibika reru no ka
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Kare koso wa anata gata o tsukuri, anata gata no tame ni, chokaku, shikaku, kanjo (chiryoku) o atae rareta katadearu. Nanto anata gata no kansha no nen no usui koto yo
Itte yaru ga i. `Kare koso wa, anata gata o chijo ni bunsan shi han'ei sa se rareta katadeari, anata gata wa kare no omoto ni atsume rareru
Kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa,`moshi anata gata no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kono keiyaku wa nanji (hatasa reru no)dearou ka.' To iu
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Hontoni sore o shiru no wa, arra dakedearu. Watashi wa komeina keikoku-sha nisuginai
Kare-ra ga me no hen ni sore o miru toki, fushin-sha-tachi no kao wa kanashimi ni kumoru. `Kore ga anata gata no motomete ita mono (yakusoku no joju)dearu.' To tsuge rareru

Gen tte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa kangaenai no ka, moshi arra ga, watashi ya watashi to issho no mono o horobosa rete mo, mata jihi o atae rarete mo, oyoso fushin-sha o tsuretsuna chobatsu kara sukuu mono wa daredearou ka

Itte yaru ga i. `Kare wa jihi amaneku okata de arare, watashi-tachi wa kare o shinko shi, kare ni (subetewo) takusu. Yagate anata gata wa, akirakana kago no naka ni iru mono ga daredearu no ka o shirudearou
Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa kangaenai no ka. Moshi aru asa, anata gata no mizu ga chika ni shizumi sattanaraba, waki deru mizu o, anata gata ni motaraseru mono wa, ittai daredearu no ka
Nun. Fude ni chikai kete, mata kaita mono ni oite chikau
Omo no onkei ni oite, anata wa kichigaide wanai
Iya, hontoni anata ni wa, tsukinai hosho ga arou
Hontoni anata wa, sukona tokusei o sonaete iru
Yagate anata wa miyou, kare-ra mo mata mirudearou
Anata gata no dare ga kichigaidearu ka o
Hontoni anata no omo wa,-do kara mayoi satta mono o, mottomo yoku shitte ora re, mata michibika rete iru mono o mottomo yoku shiri tsukusa reru katadearu
Sorede anata wa (shinri o) hinin suru mono ni shitagatte wa naranai
Kare-ra no negai wa, anata ga ayumiyoru koto de, so nareba kare-ra mo dakyo shitai nodearu
Anata wa, hiretsuna chikai o tateru don'na mono ni mo kutsuju shite wa naranai
Chusho shi, waruguchi o ii aruku mono
zenji o samatage, okite ni somuku tsumibukaimono
ranbo (zangyaku)na-sha, sono soto sujo no iyashi-sha
tomi to (oku no) shijo o motte iru tame ni (sodearu, korera no mono ni shitagatte wa naranai)
Kare ni waga shirushi ga Satoru 唱 Sa reru to,`sore wa mukashi no monogataridesu.' To iu
Yagate ware wa, hana no ue ni yakiin o osudearou
Hontoni ware wa,(kaju)-en no mochinushi o kokoromita yo ni, kare-ra o kokoromita. Kare-ra ga, socho ni sore (kudamono) o shukaku suru koto o chikatta toki ni
(arra no o nozominaraba) to, joken o tsukeru koto o shinakatta
Sore de kare-ra ga nemutte iru ma ni, anata no nushi kara no tenbatsu ga sore o osotta
Sorede asa ni wa, sore wa tsumitora reta yo ni natta
Socho kare-ra wa tagaini sakenda
Moshi shukaku suru nonara anata gata no hata ni isogimashou
Sokode kare-ra wa tei koe ni sasayaki atte dekaketa
Kyo wa hitori no binbonin mo, ano (kaju-en) ni haira sete wa narimasen
Kare-ra wa tsuyoku kokoro ni kimete, asa hayaku deteitta
Daga kare-ra ga sore o mita toki, itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, michi o machigaete iru
Iya, watashi-tachi wa (shukaku-mono o) ubawareta
Kare-ra no naka, sukoshi odayakana hitori ga itta. `Anata gata wa doshite (omo o) tataenai no ka to, watashi ga itta no ni
Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi no omo o tataeru. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa fugidearimashita.' To itta
Soko de kare-ra wa, tagaini semeai hajimeta
Kare-ra wa itta. `A kanashi, watashi-tachi wa hontoni oheideshita
Omo wa kore ni kawaru, sara ni yoi (kaju-en) o atae rareru kamo shirenai. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa,(kaigo shite) omo ni tangan shimasu
Kono yona mono ga,(gense no) chobatsudearu. Daga raise no chobatsu wa sarani okina monodearu. Moshi kare-ra ni wakatte itanaraba
Hontoni arra o osoreru mono ni taishite wa,-nushi no omoto ni ki kobi no rakuen ga arou
Ware wa shinjinbukai-sha-tachi o, tsumibito no yo ni atsukau to demo iu no ka
Anata gata wa do shita no ka. Anata gata wa do handan suru no ka
Soretomo anata gata ni wa, manabu ni tariru Keisuke ga aru no ka
Anata gata ga erabu mono wa, nani demo sono Keisuke no naka ni aru no ka
Soretomo anata gata wa, shinpan no hi made yukona seiyaku o wareto musunda no ka. Anata gataga shiryobunbetsu suru koto wa, tashikani anata gata no mono ni naru no ka
(Muhanmado yo) kare-ra ni toe. `Kare-ra no dare ga sore o hosho suru nodesu ka
Matawa, kare-ra wa (omoni) haisuru mono ga aru no ka. Kare-ra ga tadashi nonara, sono haisuru mono o tsurete kitasa se nasai
Sune ga, gen wa ni sa reru hi (o omoi nasai). Kare-ra wa sajida suru yo motome rareru. Daga kare-ra ni wa dekinaidearou
Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o komurudearou. Sajida suru yo, tashika ni kare-ra wa yobikake rarete ita. Sonotoki gotai manzokunanoni (kyohi shita)
Sokode kono o kotoba (kuruan) o kyogidearu to suru mono o ware ni makase yo. Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzukanai homen kara, ippo ichiichi (daraku ni) michibiki
kare-ra o yuyo surudearou. Hontoni ware no keiryaku wa tsuyoku tashikadearu
Soretomo anata ga kare-ra ni hoshu o motome, sore de kare-ra wa futan o kase rareta no ka
Mata yugen-kai ga kare-ra no temoto ni ari, sore de kare-ra wa (sore o) kakikudasu koto ga dekiru no ka
Dakara nintai shite, anata no omo no meirei o mate. Sakana no tomo no yodeatte wa naranai. Kurushi-sa no amari (kare ga) sakenda toki (no yo ni)
Nushi kara no onkei ga kare ni tasshinakattanaraba, kare wa tsumi o owasa re, fumenboku ni fumonochi ni suteraretadearou
Kono yo ni omo wa, kare o erabi seigi no to no hitori to nasa reta
Fushinjin-sha wa keikoku o kiku toki, sono (monosugoi) metsuki de, anata o 凡 Ndo taoren bakari ni suru. Kare-ra wa iu. `Hontoni kare wa tsuka reta monodesu
Daga, kono (kuruan) koso wa, ban'yu no tame no kunkai nihokanaranai
Tashikana shinjitsu
tashikana shinjitsu to wa nani ka
Tashikana shinjitsu ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Samudo to ado (no min) wa, totsuzen kuru saiyaku o kyogidearu to shita
Sore de samudo wa raiun no arashi ni yotte horobosa reta
Mata ado wa unari kuruu kaze ni yotte horobosa reta
Yoru 8-nichi ni watari, kare-ra ni taishi taema naku (arashi ga) osoi, sore de kuchita natsumeyashi no ki no yo ni,(subete no) min ga soko ni taorete iru no o, anata wa mitadearou
Sorede anata wa, kare-ra no naka, dare ka nokotte iru mono o miru no ka
Mata firuaun ya kare izen no mono ya horobosa reta sho toshi (no min) mo, tsumi o okashite ita
Kare-ra wa omo no shito ni shitagawanainode, kare wa moretsuna chobatsu de kare-ra o shobatsu shita
Omizu no toki, ware ga hakobune de anata gata o hakonda no wa
sore o anata gata e no kyokun to sa se, chuibukai mimi ga sore o (kii te) kioku ni todomeru tamedearu
Sore de rappa ga ichi fuki fuka reta toki
daichi ya yamayama wa mochiage rare, ichigeki de konagona ni kudaka re
sonohi (ichidai) jiken ga okoru
Mata ozora wa chiji ni sakeru. Ten ga moroku yowai hidearou
Tenshi-tachi wa, sono (ten no) hashibashi ni ori, sonohi, 8-ri (no tenshi) ga kare-ra no ue ni, anata no omo no gyokuza o ninaudearou
Sonohi anata gata wa (shinpan no tame) mina 剝 Ki-dashi ni sa re nanihitotsu to shite kakushi osenaidearou
Sore de migite ni sono (gyojo)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `Koko ni (kite), anata gata wa watashi no (gyojo)-ki o yome
Izure watashi (shinja) no seisan (shinpan) ni au koto ga, hontoni wakatte ita
Koshite kare wa shifukuna seikatsu ni hitari
takai (oka no)-en no naka de
samazamana kajitsu ga tedjika ni aru
Anata gata wa, sugisatta hi (gense) de okonatta (zenko no) tame ni, man'etsu shite tabe, katsu nome.'(To iwa reyou)
daga hidarite ni sono (gyojo)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `A , watashi no (gyojo)-ki ga watasa renakattanaraba
Watashi wa jibun no seisan ga, don'na monodearu ka o shiranakatta
A, sono (shi) ga,(watashi no) shumatsudeattanaraba
tomi wa, watashi ni yakudatanakatta
Ken'i wa, watashi katara kieusete shimatta
(Daga genmei ga kudarou. ) `Kare o toraete, shibare
Sore kara moesakaru hi de, kare o yake
Sarani 70 wanshaku no naga-sa no kusari de., Kare o make
Hontoni kare wa, idainaru arra o shinjizu
mata hinja o yashinau koto o susumenakatta
Sorede kono hi kare wa, soko ni tomo wa naku
mata, kegarawashi fuhai-mono no soto ni shokumotsu wanai
sore o taberu no wa, tsumibito dakedearu
Ware wa, anata gataga mi eru mono ni oite chikai
mata anata gataga mi enai mono ni oite chikau
Hontoni kore wa, sonkina shito no kotobadearu
Kore wa shijin no kotobade wanai. Daga anata gata wa, hotondo shinjinai
Mata, uranaishi no kotoba demonai. Shikashi anata gata wa hotondo ki ni moshi nai
(Koreha) ban'yu no nushi kara kudasa reta keijidearu
Moshi kare (shito) ga, ware ni kanshite nanrakano kotoba o netsuzo surunaraba
ware wa kitto kare no migite o torae
kare no keidomyaku o kanarazu kirudearou
Anata gata no naka, darehitori, kare o mamotte yarenai nodearu
Hontoni kore wa,-nushi o osoreru mono e no kunkaidearu
Ware wa anata gata no naka,(sore o) kyohi suru mono o shiru
Hontoni kono (kuruan) wa, fushin-sha ni totte wa kanashimi (no tane)dearou
Daga sore wa, hontoni kakkotaru fudo no shinridearu
Dakara shidainaru okata, anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
Aru mono ga, kudarubeki chobatsu ni tsuite tou
Fushinjin-sha wa, sore o fusegu koto wa dekinai
Kaidan no shu, arra kara (no chobatsu)dearu
Tenshi-tachi ya seirei (dai tenshi jiburiru) wa, tsuitachi ni shite, kare no moto ni noboru, sono (tsuitachi no) naga-sa wa, 5 man-nendearu
Dakara anata wa, rippa ni taeshinobe
Hontoni kare-ra wa, sore (Ni~Tsu) o toi to omou
Shikashi ware wa, sore o chikai to miru
Ten ga toketa do no yo ni naru hi
yamayama wa, suita yomo no yo ni nari
dare mo tomo (no anpi) o tou koto wanai
Kare-ra wa tagaini kao o awaseru koto ga dekinai hodo osoreru. Tsumi aru mono wa sonohi, jibun no tsumiwoaganau tame ni jibun no kodomo-tachi o sashidasou to negaudearou
Kare no tsuma ya kyodai
kare o kabatta kinshin
jibun o sukuerunaraba, chijo no subete no mono o agete aganau koto o koi negaudearou
Danjite dekinai. Hontoni kano (jigoku no) hono wa
atama no kawa made ken gi toru
(Seigi ni) se o misete, somuki satta-sha o shokan surudearou
Mata chikuseki shi, intoku no kin o motsu mono o mo
Ningen wa hontoni sewashinaku tsukura rete iru
Saiyaku ni aeba nageki kanashimi
koun ni aeba monooshimi ni naru
Daga reihai ni shojin suru mono wa,-sode wanai
Reihai o genshu shite iru mono
mata kare-ra no tomi ga, koseidearu to mitome rarete iru mono
monogoi suru mono ya taibo suru mono no tame ni (hodokosu mono)
mata shinpan no hi no shinjitsu o kakunin shite iru mono
mata kare-ra no omo no chobatsu o osoreru mono mo
Hontoni omo no chobatsu kara, anzendearu to kangaerubekide wanai
Mata kakureta tokoro (teisetsu) o mamoru mono
kare-ra no tsuma ya migite no shoyu suru mono ni kagitte iru baai wa betsu de,-zai ni wa naranai
Shikashi kore igai ni motomeru mono wa ho o koeta monodearu
Futaku sa reta koto ya yakusoku ni chujitsuna-sha
shogen ni koseina-sha
mata reihai o genshu suru mono
Korera no mono wa eiyo o ete rakuen no naka ni (sumu)
Ima fushinjin-sha-tachi ga, anata no kata ni isoide iru no wa nanigoto ka
Migi kara mata hidarikara,-gun ni natte
Kare-ra wa mina shifuku no rakuen ni hairu koto o nozomu no ka
Iya, danjite dekinai kotodearu. Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra ga shiru mono kara, kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu
Iya, ware wa azuma to nishi no omo ni yotte chikau. Ware ni totte wa kanodearu
Kare-ra yori mo sugureta (soto no)-sha o motte, kare-ra ni kaete yarou. Ware wa, shippai suru koto wa nai nodearu
Dakara anata wa, kare-ra o (kyoei ni) hitara se, tawamure ni makaseruga yoi. Kare-ra ga yakusoku sa rete iru, sonohi no kaiken made
Kare-ra ga haka kara awatadashiku detekuru-bi. Sore wa marude (gense de) kare-ra ga guzo kami e to isoida yo ni
Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o komurudearou. Kore ga kare-ra ni yakusoku sa rete ita, sonohidearu
Hontoni ware wa, nufu o sono min ni tsukawashi,`itamashi chobatsu ga anata no min ni kudaru mae ni, anata wa, kare-ra ni keikoku shi nasai.'(To meijita)
Kare wa itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, watashi wa anata gata e no komeina 1-ri no keikoku-shadesu
Anata gata wa arra ni tsukae, kare o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai

Kare wa anata gata no samazamana tsumi o yurushi, sadame rareta kigen made, anata gata o yuyo nasa remasu. Hontoni arra no kigen ga kita toki wa, yuyo sa remasen. Moshi anata gata ga wakatte itanaraba
Kare (nufu) wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, watashi wa yoru mo hiru mo, watashi no hitobito ni yobikakemashita
Daga, watashi no yobikake wa, tada (seido kara no) tohi o masu bakaridesu

Watashi ga kare-ra ni,“kare ga, anata gata o o yurushi ni naru noda” to yobikakeru toki, kare-ra wa yubi o jibun no mimi ni sashikomi, jibun de gaito o komutte (fushinjin o) koshu shi, hitasura koman ni narimasu
Sorede watashi wa,-goe o okiku shite kare-ra ni yobikakemashita
Arutoki wa ko ni, mata (arutoki wa) hisoka ni kare-ra ni (uttaete)
watashi wa iimashita. “Anata gata no omo no o yurushi o negae. Hontoni kare wa, tabitabi o yurushi nasa reru
Kare wa, anata gata no ue ni yutaka ni ame o furase rare
anata gata no zaisan ya shijo o fuyashi, mata anata gata no tame ni, samazamana en ya (mizu no nagareru) kasen o moke rareru
Anata gata wa do shita no ka. Arra no goshinsetsu, gamandzuyo-sa ni taishite, nozomi o motanai to wa
Kare wa hontoni junjoyoku dankai o o tte anata gata o tsukura reta
Anata gata wa, arra ga 7 ten o ikaga ni isso mata isso to, tsukura reta ka o kangaete minakatta no ka
Mata tsuki o sono Chu no akari to sa re, taiyo o (moeru) tomyo to nasa reta ka o
Arra wa anata gata o tsuchi kara sodate rare
sorekara, anata gata wa daichi ni kisa re, mata oki nobora se rareru
Mata arra wa anata gata no tame ni, daichi o nobe hiroge rare
sokode anata gata wa, hiroi daido o orai surudearou. ” To itte kika semashita
Nufu wa (sarani) itta. `Omo yo, kare-ra wa watashi ni shitagaimasen. Jibun no zaisan to shijo to de, hametsu o jocho suru mono ni dake shitagaimasu
Soshite judaina sakubo o takuramimasu
Kare-ra wa iimasu. “Anata gata no kamigami o suteru na. Waddo mo suwau mo, mata yagusu mo yauku mo nasuru mo, sutete wa naranai. ”
Kare-ra wa sudeni oku no mono o mayowa semashita. (Omo yo) mayoi o honin sa rete mo, fugi o okonau mono o oku shinaide kudasai
Kare-ra wa samazamana tsumi no tame ni obore sase rare, sarani hi goku ni okura re, arra no soto ni wa, don'na enjo-sha mo e rarenakatta
Nufu wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, fushinjin'na kyoju-sha o darehitori to shite chijo ni nokosanaide kudasai
Moshi anata ga kare-ra o nokosa rereba, kare-ra wa kanarazu anata ni tsukaeru mono o mayowa se, mata tsumiwookasu fushinjin'na mono no soto, umanaideshou

Omo yo, watashi to watashi no ryoshin o o yurushi kudasai. Mata shinja to shite watashi no ie ni hairu mono, mata (subete no) shinko suru otoko to shinko suru on'na-tachi o o yurushi kudasai. Soshite fugi o okonau mono-tachi ni wa, metsubo no soto ni wa (nani mo) kuwaenaide kudasai
Ie,`watashi ni ko keiji sa reta. Ichidan no jin ga (kuruan o) kiite itta. “Watashi-tachi wa, hontoni odorokubeki dokuju o kiita
Tadashi michi e no michibikidearu. Dakara watashi-tachi wa shinko shi, omoni nanimono o mo haisanai
Songen ni shite ito takaki omo no o iko yo, kare wa tsuma o metorazu,-ko mo mota renai
Watashi-tachi no naka no orokana mono ga, arra ni taishi tohomonai uso o hanashite ita
Shikashi watashi-tachi wa, ningen mo Jin mo, arra ni tsuite uso o iubekide wa nai to kangaete ita
Hontoni arushu no ningen wa, jin no aru mono ni higo o motomeru. Shikashi sore wa, kare-ra no guretsu o jocho shita
Kare-ra mo anata gataga kangaeta yo ni, arra wa, nanimono mo yomigaera sa renaidarou to kangaete ita
Watashi-tachi wa, ten (no himitsu) ni fureyou to shitaga, kore wa tsuyoi goei no moe kagayaku hoshi (ryusei) de ippaidearu koto ga wakatta
Watashi-tachi wa (nusumi) kiku tame ni soko ni suwatte ita. Daga kikimimiwotateru-sha ni wa, keikai shite iru moe kagayaku hoshi (ryusei) ga machikamaete iru
Watashi-tachi wa,-nushi ga chijo no mono ni taishite aku o nozoma rete iru no ka, matawa, kare-ra o tadashi michi ni, michibiku koto o nozoma rete iru no ka shiranakatta
Watashi-tachi no nakaniha, tadashi mono mo iru ga,-sode wanai mono mo ite, samazamana michi ni shitagatte iru
Daga watashi-tachi wa, chijo ni oite arra o dashinuku koto wa dekinaishi, mata tohi shite, kare o shippai sa seru koto mo dekinai to omotte iru
Watashi-tachi wa michibiki o kiite, sugu sore o shinko shita. Soshite omo o shinjiru mono ni wa, osore mo naku, son'u koto mo naku, mata fusei ni au koto mo nai
Watashi-tachi no nakaniha,(arra ni) fukuju, kie suru mono mo ari, mata seido kara hagureru mono mo iru. Fukuju, kie shita mono wa tadashi michi ni shiko o sadameru
Daga seido kara hagureru mono wa hi goku no maki to narou. ” To
Mo shikare-ra ga (tadashi) michi o mamorunaraba, ware wa kanarazu yutakana ame (subete no onkei) o kare-ra ni megumu
Ware wa sore ni yotte kare-ra o kokoromiyou. Daga omo o nen'u koto kara hagureru mono wa, kibishi chobatsu ni oitate rareru koto ni naru
Hontoni masujido wa (subete) arra no yudearu. Sorede arra to doi ni hai shite hoka no mono ni inotte wa naranai
Arra no shimo be (muhanmado) ga, kare ni inoru tame ni tatta toki, kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) wa dotto oshiyosen bakari ni, kare o torimaita
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa, ichizu ni waga omoni inori, nani mo kare to doi ni haisanai
Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi ni wa, anata gata o gaishi tari, eki shi tari suru chikara wa nai nodearu
Itte yaru ga i. `Dare mo arra kara watashi o mamori kiru koto wa dekinaishi, mata kare no soto ni, hinansho o miidasu koto mo dekinai
(Watashi wa) tada arra kara no o tsuge o, nobetsutaeru ni suginai. Sorede arra to sono shito ni shitagawanai mono, kare-ra ni wa jigoku no hi ga ari, eien ni sono naka ni sumudearou
Kare-ra wa, yakusoku sa reta koto o miru toki ni natte, joryoku ni oite dare ga mo tayori ni naranai ka,-su ni oite mo dare ga mottomo tayori ni naranai ka o shirudearou
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa, anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta koto ga chikadzuite iru no ka, soretomo arra ga mosukoshi kikan o moke rareta no ka o shiranai
Kare (dake) ga yugen-kai o shitte ora re, sono himitsu o darenimo mo sa re wa shinai
Kare no o ki ni meshita shito igai ni wa. Sorede, kare wa, mae kara mo ushirokara mo goei shite,(shito o) omomuka se rareta
Sore wa kare-ra ga, hatashite omo no o tsuge o tsutaeta ka do ka o kare ga shira reru tamedeari, mata kare-ra no motsu mono o torikakonde, subete o sorezore keisan ni kazoeage rareru tamedearu
I o atama kara matou mono (muhanmado) yo
Yakan ni (reihai ni)-tate, sho toki o nozoite
Yakan no hanbun, mata sore yori mo sukoshi chidjimete (reihai ni tate)
aruiwa, sore yori mo sukoshi oku reihai ni (tate), soshite yukkuri to shinchona choshi de, kuruan o yome
Yagate ware wa, sochona o kotoba (kuruan) o anata ni kudasudearou
Hontoni yakan (reihai) ni okiru koto wa, mottomo chikaradzuyoi ayumideari, okotoba o isso meikaku ni suru
Hontoni anata wa, hiruma wa yomu de nagaku owa reru
Sorede anata no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi, seikon o katamukete kare ni tsukae nasai
Azuma to nishi no omode ara re, kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Sore de kare o, o tsuchi subeki ho to shite aogi nasai
Kare-ra no iu koto o taeshinobi, kare-ra o hanare yo, rippa ni mi o kawase
Gense no tomi ni azukatte uso-tsuki yobawari suru mono-tachi o ware ni yudanete, shibarakunoaida kare-ra o nao kumishi nasai
hontoni ware no temoto ni wa kusari ga ari, mata hono mo aru
(Nodo ni)-byo eru shokumotsu ga ari, mata itamashi chobatsu ga aru
Sonohi, daichi to yamayama wa shindo shi, yamayama wa kuzure nagarete, suna no katamari ni narudearou
Hontoni ware wa, anata gata no shonin to suru tame ni, shito o anata gata ni tsukawashita. Ware ga katsute, firuaun ni hitori no shito o okutta yo ni
Daga firuaun wa sono shito ni shitagawanakattanode, ware wa kare o kibishiku basshite hametsu sa seta
Moshi anata gataga izentoshite (arra o) kyohi surunara, kodomo ga (kyofu no amari) shiraga ni naru hi, anata gata wa doshite jibun o mamoreyou ka
Sonohi, ten wa sake chirudearou. Kare no yakusoku wa, kanarazu kansui sa reru nodearu
Hontoni kore wa kunkaidearu. Sore de nozomu mono ni,-nushi e no michi o tora se nasai

Omo wa, anata ga yakan no hotondo 3-bun'no 2, mata (arutokiha) 2-bun'no 1, matawa 3-bun'no 1 o,(reihai ni) tatsu koto o shitte ora reru. Mata anata to ichi Moro ni iru ichidan no mono mo doyodearu. Arra wa, yoru to hiru o dato ni hakara reru. Kare wa anata gataga sore o hakarenai koto o shiri, anata gata o itsukushima reru. Dakara anata gata wa, kuruan o muri ni naranai teido ni yome. Kare wa, anata gata no naka yameru mono no aru koto o shitte ora reru. Mata aru mono wa arra no onkei o motomete, chijo o tabi shi, aru mono wa arra no michi no tame ni tatakatte iru (koto o). Dakara sore o muri ni naranai teido ni yome. Reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o nashi, arra ni rippana kashi tsuke (shinko no tame no sanzai) o shi nasai. Anata gataga, jibun no tamashi no tame ni arakajime okonau, don'na yoi koto mo, arra no omoto de sore o miidasou. Sono (zenko no) hosho wa, saizen ni shite saidaidearu. Anata gata wa arra no o yurushi o koi motomeruga i. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
(Dai i ni) tsutsumiru mono yo
tachinobotte keikoku shi nasai
Anata no omo o tatae nasai
Mata anata no i o seiketsu ni tamochi nasai
Fujo o sake nasai
Mikaeri o kitai shite hodokoshite wa naranai
Anata no omo no (michi no) tame ni, taeshinobi nasai
Rappa ga fuka reru toki
sonohi wa kunan no hi
Fushin-sha-tachi ni tori, yasuragi no nai (Ni~Tsudearu)
Ware ga tsukutta mono o, ware hitori ni makase nasai
Ware wa, kare ni yutakana tomi o sazuke
mata sono mawari ni, musuko-tachi o habera se
kare no tame ni,(monogoto o) enman yoi ni shita
Sore demo kare wa, ware ga sarani yutaka ni suru yo hosshita
Danjite yurusa renai. Kare wa, waga shirushi ni taishi ganmeideatta
Yagate ware wa, hidoi tsuku de kare o nayamasudearou
Kare wa so o neri, sakubo shita
Kare wa horobirudearou. Nanto (akui o motte) kare-ra wa sakubo shita koto yo
Kasanete iu. Kare wa horobirudearou. Nanto kare wa sakubo shita koto yo
Sonotoki, kare wa chiratto (kuruan o) nagame
Mayu o hisome, nigai kao o shite
sorekara, koman ni se o mukete satta
Kare wa itta. `Kore wa mukashi kara no majutsu ni sugimasen
Do mite mo ningen no kotoba ni sugimasen
Yagate ware wa jigoku no hi de, kare o yakudearou
Jigoku no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Sore wa nanimono mo manukare sasezu, mata nanimono mo nokosanai
Hito no hifu o, kuroku kogasu
Sono-jo ni wa 19 (no tenshi ga kanshuru)

Ware ga goka no kanshu to shite, tenshi-tachi no soto ni dare mo meijinakatta. Mata kare-ra no kazu o gentei shita koto wa, fushinjin no mono-tachi ni taisuru hitotsu no kokoromi ni suginai. (Sore ni yori) keiten o sadzuke rareta-sha-tachi o kakushin sa se, mata shinjiru mono no shinko o fukameru tamedearu. Mata keiten o sadzuke rareta mono ya shinja-tachi ga, utagai o nokosazu, mata sono kokoro ni yamai no yadoru mono ya, fushin-sha-tachi ni,`arra wa kono hiyu de, nani o o nozomi ni naru nodeshou ka.' To iwa seru tamedearu. Ko no yo ni arra wa, o jibun no nozomi no mono o mayowa se, mata nozomi no mono o michibika reru. Soshite kare no soto dare mo anata no omo no gunzei o shiranai nodearu. Hontoni kore wa ningen ni taisuru kunkai nihokanaranai
Iya, tsuki ni chikai kete
dokou to suru, yoru ni chikai kete
mata kagayakou to suru, akatsuki ni chikai kete (chikau)
Sore wa okina (shirushi no) hitotsudeari
ningen e no keikoku
Anata gata no naka, mae ni susumu koto o nozomu mono, mata ato ni nokoru koto o negau mono e no (keikokudearu)
Sorezore no tamashi wa, sono okonatta koto ni taishi,(arra ni) tanpo o teikyo shite iru
Migite no nakama wa betsudearu
(Kare-ra wa) rakuen no naka ni ite, tagaini tazune audearou
Tsumi o okashita-sha-tachi ni tsuite
nani ga, anata gata o rekka no naka ni michibiita nodesu ka.' To
Kare-ra wa (kotaete) iu. `Watashi-tachi wa reihai o sasagete imasendeshita
Watashi-tachi wa mata, hinja o yashinaimasendeshita
Watashi-tachi wa kuron no to to tomoni muda-banashi ni fukeri
tsuneni shinpan no hi o hitei shite imashita
Tsuini shinjitsu ga, watashi-tachi ni torai shimashita
Sore de torinasu mono no torinashi mo, kare-ra ni yakudatanaidearou
一体訓戒 Kara somuki saru to wa, kare-ra wa do shita nodearou
Kare-ra wa chodo shishi o mite kyofu ni ochitta roba no yo ni
ichimokusan ni nigedasu ka no yodeatta
Iya, kare-ra wa sorezore aka reta shokan ga sadzuke rareru koto o nozonde iru
Iya danjite sode wanai. Kare-ra wa raise o osorete inai nodearu
Iya, kore wa masani kunkaidearu
Dakara dare demo hossuru mono ni wa, sore o kimo ni meiji sase nasai
Daga, arra ga nozoma reru mono no soto wa, ryui shinaidearou. Kare wa kashiko rubeki okata yoku yurushite kudasa reru okatadearu
Watashi wa, fukkatsu no hi ni oite chikau
Mata, jiseki suru tamashi ni oite chikau
Ningen wa, ware ga kare no hone o atsume rarenai to kangaeru no ka
Iya, ware wa kare no yubisaki (no hone) made soroeru koto ga dekiru nodearu
Daga ningen wa, kare no gozen (no seikatsu) ni oite mo, tsumiwookasu koto o nozomu
Kare wa,`fukkatsu no hi wa itsuka.' To tou
Tsuini megakuramu-ji
tsuki wa 蝕 Keri
taiyo to tsuki wa awase rareru
Sonohi ningen wa,`doko ni hinan shiyou ka.' To iu
Danjite yoke rarenai nodearu
Anata no omo no omoto ga, sonohi sadame no sumaidearu
Sonohi (subete no) ningen wa, sudeni itta koto to,-go ni nokoshita koto ni tsuite kaku-ge rarerudearou
Iya ningen wa, jibun jishin ni taishi shonindearu
Tatoe kare ga, iroiro benkai shite mo
Kono (kuruan o saisoku suru tame ni) anata no shita o isogashi ku ugokashite wa naranai
Sore o atsume, sore o yoma seru no wa, ware no shigotodearu
Sorede ware ga sore o yonda toki, sono dokuju ni shitagae
Sarani sore o tokiakasu no mo, hontoni ware no shigotodearu
Iya, anata gata wa (hate nai) ukiyo o aishite
raise o tokan ni suru
Sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kagayaki
kare-ra no omo o, aogi miru
Mata sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kuraku
sebone o kudaku hodo no dai sainan ga, kare-ra ni furikakaru koto o shirudearou
Iya,(tamashi ga) nodomoto ni todoku toki
iwa reyou. `Dareka, noroi ga dekiru ka
Kare wa ribetsu (no toki)dearu koto o satorudearou
Hitotsu no ashi wa taho no ashi ni karamari
sonohi kare wa, omo ni karitate rareru
Kare wa shinri o ukeirezu, mata reihai mo bo-ge nakatta
kaette (Mari) o kyogi to shi, somuki sari
omoi agatte kazoku no moto ni omomuita
Anata (tashinkyo to) ni wazawai are,(hontoni) wazawai naru ka na
Kasanete iu. Anata ni wazawai are,(hontoni) wazawai naru ka na
Ningen wa,(mokuteki mo naku) sono mama de honin sa reru to omou no ka
Motomoto kare wa shashutsu sa reta, itteki no seiekide wa nakatta ka
Sore kara hitokatamari no chi to nari, sarani arra ga,(kinsei ni) katachidzukuri
kare wa, ningen o otome no ryosei ni nasa reta node wa nakatta ka
Sore demo kare ni wa, shisha o yomigaera seru o-ryoku ga nai to suru no ka
Ningen ni wa, nani mo no tomo yobenai, nagai jiki ga attade wanai ka
Hontoni ware wa kare o kokoromiru tame kongo shita itteki no seieki kara ningen o tsukutta. Sorede ware wa chokaku to shikaku o kare ni sazuketa
Ware wa, ningen ni (tadashi) michi o shimeshita. Kansha suru mono (shinjiru mono) ni naru ka, shinjinai mono ni naru ka, to
Fushinjin-sha ni wa, ware wa kusari to kubikase to rekka o junbi shite oita
(Shinja no) zenkosha wa, kafuru o mazeta hai (no nomimono) o nomudearou
(Soreha) arra no shimo be-tachi ga nomu izumi no koto de, ware wa omoinomamani konkonto (izumi o) waki dasa seru
Kare-ra (zenkosha) wa chikai o hatashi, saiyaku no hirogaru hi o osorete iru
Mata kare-ra wa, kare o keiai suru tame ni, hinja to minashigo to horyo ni shokumotsu o ataeru
(Soshite iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa, arra no o yorokobi o negatte, anata gata o yashinai, anata gata ni hoshu mo kansha mo motomemasen
Watashi-tachi wa,-nushi no kuju ni michita o ikarinohi o osoremasu
Sorede arra wa, sonohi no saiyaku kara kare-ra o mamori, subarashi yorokobi o atae rareru
Kare-ra ga taeshinondanode, kare wa rakuen to kinu (no i) de kare-ra ni mukuwa re
sono (rakuen no)-chu de, nedoko no ue ni yuttari to mi o nobashi, kare-ra wa kokusho no taiyo mo, koru samuke mo oboenaidearou
(Jumoku no) kokage wa kare-ra no ue o oi,(kajitsu no) bo wa tsutsumashiku tare kudaru
Gin no mizusashi to garasuno-hai wa, kare-ra no ma ni mawasa reyou
Garasu (no hai to mieta no) wa gin de tsukura rete ite, kare-ra wa konomi no ryo o sore ni mitasu
Kare-ra wa soko de, shoga o mazeta hai no nomimono o atae rareyou
Soko ni, sarusabiru to nadzuke rareru izumi ga aru
Mata eien no shonen-tachi ga kare-ra no ma o 往米 Shi, anata ga kare-ra o miru to, maki chirasa reta shinjudearu to omoudearou
Anata wa shisen o mukeru to shifuku no sodaina sangoku o shitatamerudearou
Kare-ra wa utsukushi midoriiro no kinu to nishiki no soto i o matoi, gin no udewa de kazara re,-nushi wa kare-ra ni junryona nomimono o noma se rareru
Hontoni kore wa anata gata ni taisuru hoshodearu. Anata gata no doryoku ga uke haira reta nodearu.'(To ose rareyou)
Ware koso wa, dankai o o tte anata ni kuruan o kudashita monodearu
Dakara (dendo ni sen'nen shi), anata no omo no shinpan o taeshinonde mate. Kare-ra no naka no tsumi aru mono ya, fushinjin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai
Asanayuna, anata no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi nasai
Soshite yoru no ichibu o kare ni sajida shi, choya no shijima ni, kare o tatae nasai
Hontoni korera no mono wa, tsukanoma no seikatsu o aishi, judaina-bi o haigo ni sutesaru
Kare o tsukuri, sono shishi o kataku baku gi tometa no wa ware deru. Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra to ruiji no soto no mono de oki kaeru koto mo dekiru nodearu
Hontoni kore wa hitotsu no kunkaidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono ni wa, kare no omo e no michi o tora se nasai
Daga arra ga o nozomi ni naranakereba, anata gata wa hosshinaidearou. Arra wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru
Kare wa, o kokoronikanau-sha o jihi ni yoku sa se, mata fugi no to ni taishite wa tsuretsuna chobatsu o sonae rareru

seizon-sha to shisha (soho no tame ni)

chodo (kyohon suru) kokasshoku no rakuda no yo

mata moshi-biraki mo, kare-ra ni yurusarenaidearou

Sore wa sabaki no hideari, ware wa anata gata mo (anata gata) izen no mono-tachi mo, issho ni atsumeru
Anata gata ni nanika jussaku ga aru nonara, ware ni mukatte sakubo suruga i

Kokoronosokokara manzoku shite tabe katsu nome, anata gata (no yoi) okonai o shita koto ni taishite.'(To ware wa iou)
Kono yo ni ware wa, yoi okonai no mono-tachi ni mukuiru
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
(Anata gata fugi no mono yo. ) `Shibashi no ma tabe katsu kyoraku suruga i. Hontoni anata gata wa tsumibukaimonodearu
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Kare-ra wa,`ritsurei 〔rukuu〕 seyo.' To iwa rete mo ryurei shinai
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Kono (kuruan) o sashioite, don'na oshie o kare-ra wa shinjiyou to suru no ka
